total_subquestions_ys: Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 3s in the input grid.
Q2: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 1s in the input grid.
Q3: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 2s in the input grid.
Q4: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 4s in the input grid.
Q5: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 5s in the input grid.
Q6: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 6s in the input grid.
Q7: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 7s in the input grid.
Q8: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 8s in the input grid.
Q9: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 9s in the input grid.
Q10: Create a new grid with the same dimensions as the input grid, but filled with 0s.
Q11: For each cell identified in Q1-Q9, replace the corresponding cell in the new grid with the number of the question (i.e., the number that surrounds the cell in the input grid).
Q12: Return the new grid as the output.
Q1: Identify the cells that are surrounded by 3s in the input grid.

Q4: Create a new grid with the same dimensions as the input grid.
Q5: Fill in the new grid with the values from the cells identified in Q1, Q2, and Q3.
Q6: For the cells identified in Q1, fill in the new grid with the value 6.
Q7: For the cells identified in Q2, fill in the new grid with the value 0.
Q8: For the cells identified in Q3, fill in the new grid with the value 3.
Q9: For all other cells in the new grid, fill in with the value 0.
